text.0_Chapter, 2_Verse: And give you a whole heart to fear him and to serve him with all your heart and all your soul.
text.0_Chapter, 1_Verse: God bless you, and remember you his covenant with Abraham and Isaac and Jacob.
text.0_Chapter, 3_Verse: God will open your hearts to reflect on His Torah and keep His commandments, and will give you a blessing and peace.
text.0_Chapter, 0_Verse: ...The Jews in Jerusalem and in the land of Judah to their Jewish brethren in Egypt, peace and salvation!
